name: Searching For Stars
description:
You control a spaceship flying through space. Your aim is to collect stars that appear randomly. Enemies with strong magnetism appear to try and stop you stealing the stars. Keep going until you are ultimately disabled by your enemies. Power pads appear around the level, which you can use to your advantage. Includes a leaderboard to compare your score with others!

Move your ship with WASD and press Q to use a bomb. Press ESC at any time to quit the game.

The aim for this game is to add multiplayer functionality and bosses, however I have not had the time to put these features in yet.

Thanks for reading/playing!
